full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA LA BRTEN PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS DPUNG 'JOMS MTSON CHA 'KHOR LO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017B (ZHES DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA LA BRTEN PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS DPUNG 'JOMS MTSON CHA 'KHOR LO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I BE'U BUM DANG MAN NGAG LA BZLOG BSGYUR BYED PA'I LUGS YOD KYANG SHIN DU DKA' BA'I PHYIR CUNG ZAD RGYAS PAR BGYIS DGOS ZHES RANG GI SLOB MA DGE SLONG AER TE NI AUL TZI THU AEM CHE YE SHES BRTZON GRUS KYIS YANG YANG NAN CHEN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGA BSRUNG PHYIR DU DAM PA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYI BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL SPRANG MYOS PA BAN CHUNG BLO RGYAL MING CAN GYIS BSGRIGS PA'O, ,LHAG CHAD LA SOGS PA NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA 'KHOR DANG BCAS KYI THUGS BRTZI BAS @018A *, ,MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN BYANG CHUB MA THOB KYI BAR DU 'GAL RKYEN THAMS CAD SEL ZHING RNAM MKHYEN MYUR DU THOB PAR GYUR CIG ,YI GE PA NI SHI TAR PI LIG THU MCHOD DPONG PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS,, ,,BKRA SHIS, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
